channel.title: Google Docs on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Google Docs on Mark Needham

item.title: Google Docs: Find and replace script
item.description: I keep track of the podcasts that I’ve listened to in a Google Doc, having pasted the episode title and podcast name from Player.FM. The format isn’t exactly what I want so I’ve been running the Find and Replace command to update each entry. This is obviously a very boring task, so I wanted to see if I could automate it. An example entry in the Google Doc reads like this:
